name: Air Caves - Sci-Fi Stealth Action
description:
Explore the mysterious flying islands of an alien planet, fight with smart monsters, collect treasures and exchange them for diamonds with scary space pirates!

Features of the game:

COMPLETELY FREE!  MINIMUM ADVERTISING!

  • unique visual style.
  • exciting action.
  • simple and convenient controls.
  • atmospheric sound.
  • optimized even for weak phones.
  • unique AI of opponents based on neural networks. They do not "react" to your actions - they "behave"!
  • stylistics of classical science fiction.

Details:

The game is an action with roguelike elements. Game uses procedural level generation. A typical level is an alien labyrinth made in a sci-fi style, a maze, in which treasures and monsters are hidden. You have to use cunning, stealth skills and various bonuses in order to achieve victory.
